overview: Cassie Cage, renowned female spy, makes a fatal mistake on an important mission and loses her job. She decides to join a local spy academy before realizing it's simply a children's program. As numerous child abductions begin to arise, Cassie and fellow Spy Acaddemi classmate, Jimmy Kirkland, must take matters into their own hands.
tagline: It's more than just a spy academy...
title: Spy Acaddemi
